question: The range of electrical conductivity (σ) and resistivity (ρ) for metals, among the following, is
choices: ρ -> 10⁻⁵ to 10⁻⁶ Ωm, σ -> 10⁵ to 10⁶ S/m
ρ -> 10⁻¹¹ to 10⁻¹⁹ Ωm, σ -> 10¹¹ to 10¹⁹ S/m
ρ -> 10⁻² to 10⁻⁸ Ωm, σ -> 10² to 10⁸ S/m
ρ -> 10⁻² to 10⁻⁸ Ωm, σ -> 10² to 10⁸ S/m (Option duplicated/similar range selected in answer key)
explanation: Metals have very low resistivity (10⁻² to 10⁻⁸ Ωm) and high conductivity (10² to 10⁸ S/m).
